short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It may useful to capture the flag.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It has tools that may useful to capture the flag.

- Generate hashes of the inputs
    - length
    - md5
    - sha1
    - sha256
    - sha512
- Encoder and Decoder of the inputs
    - base64
    - caeser
    - html entity
    - hex
    - uri encode
- TCP communication tool which you can write and send a packet
